name: Beauty In The Tears Visual
metadata:
{"name": "Beauty In The Tears (Visual) 1/25", "description": "On Christmas Eve of 2020 I had a big emotional breakdown.

It was a huge avalanche of trauma from past experiences, specifically my marriage, and feelings that werenb�t properly processed and dealt with over the years finally making me crumble.

Imagine bullet proof glass being shot at repeatedly until finally...

Ib�m no stranger to venting and talking things out with close friends about fall outs with people, marital problems, music industry let downs etc. but in relation to the traumatic events that happened to me throughout life?  I didnb�t see them as something to dwell on to long. I thought it was just b�how life wentb� and often concluded those traumatic moments as the infamous saying goes b�it is what it isb�.

However, that emotional breakdown pushed me to not only pursue therapy but it also taught me a lesson in FEELing & properly dealing with my emotions post traumatic events. Days, weeks, and even a month later, I would still cry about what happened on Christmas Eve.

That wasnb�t my usual self as I was usually able to b�deal b�with my emotions in a day or two and keep moving. I didnb�t realize I was numb to the emotional abuse for so long, it had finally pierced through the armor I had built up the years.

I felt weak, broken, low and deeply hurt. But through my healing process, sorting through my emotions and embracing my feelings instead of trying to bury the pain, I found the beautiful things and lessons that would help me grow. The beautiful things that would help me keep my cup full.

And so, I began to make the music, write, record and this is what was came forth.

Ib�ve always believed vulnerability was a strength but now Ib�m stronger than everb�&

Ib�m gold fanged & floweful just like this visual (lol)", "image": "https://gateway.pinata.cloud/ipfs/bafybeib5ym7vkl57ovcu3qh5fkq246pcny3mlmhue5wcxy5hrr4a5mzxle?id=1", "animation_url": "https://gateway.pinata.cloud/ipfs/bafybeidbw63qjvb7nhse2gxdmptg7oxw7fiiszvirauzxax6fvylohvimi?id=1", "properties": {"number": 1, "name": "Beauty In The Tears (Visual)"}}
